name: Adopt a Pet!
description: Really bored? And often? Help rescue a pet in need of a good home! You won't be bored, we promise!
alt: Young puppy and kitten sitting in a field, looking incredibly adorable

name: Start a Journal
description: Instead of doomscrolling on Twitter (yes, I see you!), start writing your thoughts down. Journaling is a great way to inspire yourself and others!
alt: A woman sitting cross-legged with an open journal in her lap, getting ready to write

name: Volunteer At An Animal Shelter
description: Volunteering is a great way to help others in need and get out of the house for a while! Make a difference and have fun doing it. The best part about volunteering at an animal shelter is seeing all the cute pups and kittens!
alt: A young dog inside an animal shelter kennel, on a leash being readied to go for a walk

name: Write A Letter
description: Everyone loves getting mail, especially cards and letters. Why not help bring some of that joy into someone else's life? Writing a letter by hand can be fun and therapeutic. Use this guide to help inspire your next hand-written letter!
alt: A colorful drawing depicting two people on either side of a letter being written
